title: Always a Great Booking
text:
I have never ever have been disappointed in anything I booked on Booking.com. Easy to cancel, easy to make the reservations,  easy to upgrade if you wanna upgrade and I’d like that. They  offer points as you book. I prefer them much better than any of the other sites. Each time I do use them. I am earning points so I can get a bit more off of the next room I book very easy to use and I trust them.

Carina H

title: Booking .com
text:
This was the worst experience.
Got to the hotel. The person at the desk said I had no reservation so I went to bing.com called and they said I had no reservation. Finally the person at the desk said it was booked through an out of the country agency. There was no contact information no name. I was totally in the dark tired from travel. I looked at the room. It was supposed to be a room with two beds it had one bed and one pullout, small, rickety sofa. I asked if I could have a larger room they said I could but it was on the second floor with no elevator I am a senior and my niece with me is 63 we did not want to go up and down steep stairs.
We ask if we could have a refund and they said it would have to be made through booking.com. booking.com did not give me any information as to how or when I could get a refund 
I suggest anyone using booking.com to be very cautious as to how their hotel reservation is handled
I will tell all my friends and will never use booking.com beware

title: Comfortable Stay
text: My girlfriend and I really enjoyed our stay at the Howard Johnson near Niagara Falls. The room was clean, the customer service was good, and they had a complimentary breakfast.

title: This hotel is very good

title: Great functionality, but tablet UI needs an overhaul
text: The app itself works quite well. Easy to search for properties, good map view, filters. Everything you get with the website. Except for using your saved lists. My main use case for the app is to search a location, add places that look good to the saved list, and then later do a deep dive into my saved properties to decide on a hotel. Unfortunately the lists only work as a pop out, which is not great when viewing the list and particular bad when switching to map view. Trying to navigate the map and look at properties and photos while the app only uses, at most, 20% of my screen, is not a great experience. For now I’ve stopped using the app and only go through the website. If that get’s fixed it would be 5 stars for me because honestly everything else works wonderfully.

title: Super frustrating
text:
Neither app nor browser interfaces provide final pricing until you’ve clicked through at least once.  Makes comparison shopping like “pin the tail on the donkey.”  App features completely useless “sort by price” feature which sorts by the base price per night, but doesn’t include taxes and fees (that, in the case of a short trip, often more than double the price once you click “reserve”…but aren’t uniform across properties). So it’s never actually sorting by final price. 

We used this app extensively during a long trip in Europe and loved it.  I suspect European laws don’t let them hide the final price like they do here in the US. Not sure why anyone keeps using it—do they not notice or care that the supposed total price went up by $300 when they clicked “reserve “?

I tried to provide feedback directly to booking.com, but their “contact us” mechanism is only for issues with particular bookings so it sort of short-circuited (they responded to my feedback asking for a reservation number; I said I didn’t have one and was just providing feedback, and they responded to that asking me to contact the property directly), reinforcing my resolve to never use them again (in the US at any rate).

title: Porto visit
text: We really enjoy the stay at the Legend House from Sweet Porto. The location is prefect and close to most major attractions. A lot of choice of restaurants and cafes are a few blocks away. It is close to the metro station too. The staffs are lovely and helpful. The apartment is superb and comfortable. It has everything you need. It really makes our stay in Porto a memorable one.

title: Accommodating
text: I had the 2 Bdrm in Mt. Washington. Very clean and the host was nice and accommodating. I wanted to stay another night and he was able to accommodate my needs.

title: Favorite booking app!
text: This is so easy to use. Once you make a reservation (I've never once had to put down a deposit - sometimes have to provide a credit card to cover no shows), you can do everything from within the app: contact the hotel/whatever, change dates, cancel, etc. I love it and try to use whenever I'm traveling.

title: Great location & Best service
text: I reserve the hotel in the last minute. I was so surprised that there is a brand new hotel in Gongguam area. The bed is very comfy with best staffs service. The best is they offer almost whole day fresh toast with so many different kind of Jam and cheese that you may enjoy either morning/afternoon/night. The location is closed to the subway station. Restaurants, shops and buses all near by, I’ll highly recommend if you plan to stay in Taipei.

title: Frustration led to satisfaction
text:
I booked via bookings. Com for March 2 but when I got to the hotel they said my reservation was for March 3rd… I am not sure how that glitch happened but I had a screen shot of the confirmation number and date.
 Sadly, the hotel was full so we had to find another hotel but I contacted Bookings.Com and they refunded my money.
  Another satisfied customer:-)

title: Clean and comfortable!
text:
The room was very clean and even smelled good. The beds were very comfortable and allowed us to get the best sleep we’ve had on this trip. The desk clerks were both very friendly and helpful. The only downside was the breakfast, but we were not expecting any more, so no big deal. 

We totally recommend staying here.

title: The Best and my go to booking app.
text: Booking always my go to for Travel.  Their website is easy to navigate, has amazing content to make good booking decision, and the most competitive pricing in the industry.  Whether it’s domestic or international travel booking is my “go to”. Guys you need to follow this site.  Thank you
